record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - July 31, 2007)

[Page: H9231]

speaking.paragraph: On rollcall 765, H.R. 2347, the Iran Sanctions Enabling Act, during the period of consideration of that bill Congressman Wexler and I were away from the floor, organizing efforts to stop the wrong-headed arms sale to Saudi Arabia.
Had I been present, I would have voted in favor, and believe we need to keep on sanctioning Iran.
I yield to the gentleman from Florida.
Madam Speaker, I, too, would like to be recognized as just expressing my support for H.R. 2347.
